senses.synonym: extremely: to an extreme degree; 'extremely cold'; 'extremely unpleasant'; 'she is super smart'; 'the night was deathly cold'; 'as a child, I was deathly afraid of snakes' <i18410>

relations.target: Hell: (Christianity) the abode of Satan and the forces of evil; where sinners suffer eternal punishment; 'Hurl'd headlong...To bottomless perdition, there to dwell'- John Milton; 'a demon from the depths of the pit'; 'Hell is paved with good intentions'-Dr. Johnson <i66491>
